oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shadrack Brooks Hargis and Nancy Anne Catherine Burns Hargis photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Image of Pvt. Shadrack Brooks Hargis, Co. K, 9th Ky. Inf. Regt., USA, and his wife, Nancy Anne Catherine Burns Hargis. According to family tradition, Hargis received a wound to the hand during the war that rendered his hand useless. He wore a glove on that hand for the rest of his life. His injured hand tied up against his body in a sling. Hargis was born May 14, 1845, and died August 16, 1920. He married Nancy Anne Catherine Burns (October 1, 1842 - November 2, 1904) on January 18, 1866.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hargis, Shadrack Brooks; Hargis, Nancy Anne Catherine Burns
